00002  * @file TrackFilterMessenger.h
00003  * @brief Messenger class for building user track filters
00004  * @author JeremyMcCormick, SLAC
00005  */
00006 
00007 #ifndef SIMPLUGINS_TRACKFILTERMESSENGER_H_
00008 #define SIMPLUGINS_TRACKFILTERMESSENGER_H_
00009 
00010 #include "SimPlugins/UserActionPluginMessenger.h"
00011 
00012 #include "G4UIcmdWithAString.hh"
00013 #include "G4UIcmdWithADoubleAndUnit.hh"
00014 #include "G4UIcmdWithAnInteger.hh"
00015 #include "G4UIcmdWithoutParameter.hh"
00016 
00017 namespace ldmx {
00018 
00019     class TrackFilterPlugin;
00020     class TrackFilter;
00021 
00022     class TrackFilterMessenger : public UserActionPluginMessenger {
00023 
00024         public:
00025 
00026             TrackFilterMessenger(TrackFilterPlugin* plugin);
00027 
00028             virtual ~TrackFilterMessenger() {;}
00029 
00035             void SetNewValue(G4UIcommand *command, G4String newValue);
00036 
00037         private:
00038 
00039             template<class T> T* getFilter() {
00040                 T* filter = nullptr;
00041                 for (auto f : filters_) {
00042                     if (dynamic_cast<T*>(filter)) {
00043                         filter = dynamic_cast<T*>(f);
00044                     }
00045                 }
00046                 if (!filter) {
00047                     filter = new T;
00048                     filters_.push_back(filter);
00049                 }
00050                 return filter;
00051             }
00052 
00053         private:
00054 
00055             TrackFilterPlugin* plugin_;
00056 
00057             // energy threshold
00058             G4UIcmdWithADoubleAndUnit* thresholdCmd_;
00059 
00060             // PDG ID
00061             G4UIcmdWithAnInteger* pdgCodeCmd_;
00062 
00063             // Particle name
00064             G4UIcmdWithAString* particleCmd_;
00065 
00066             // save by physics process
00067             G4UIcommand* processCmd_;
00068 
00069             // save parents from daughter process
00070             G4UIcommand* parentCmd_;
00071 
00072             // save by region name
00073             G4UIcommand* regionCmd_;
00074 
00075             // save by volume name
00076             G4UIcommand* volumeCmd_;
00077 
00078             // save by track ID
00079             G4UIcmdWithAnInteger* trackIDCmd_;
00080 
00081             // add a filter that always passes
00082             G4UIcmdWithoutParameter* passCmd_;
00083 
00084             // set pre or post tracking hook for the current chain
00085             G4UIcmdWithAString* actionCmd_;
00086 
00087             // create a new filter chain
00088             G4UIcmdWithAString* createCmd_;
00089 
00090             // print out filter chain information
00091             G4UIcmdWithAString* printCmd_;
00092 
00093             // current set of filters being built
00094             std::vector<TrackFilter*> filters_;
00095 
00096             // tracking action hook for the filter chain (defaults to post-tracking)
00097             std::string action_{"post"};
00098     };
00099 }
